abstract: CardSpring, a Silicon Valley start-up company, is offering its technology at the South by Southwest Interactive festival in Austin, Tex., to let people make their credit cards smarter by linking them to coupons. People will be able to redeem coupons for food simply by using their credit cards to pay for the items.

headline.main: Making Plastic Credit Cards Smarter at SXSW
